name: Stoire
description: For a long time, some sounds are heard on the stairs, that leads to the laboratory. My task is to investigate this, and find out who lives there..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2, Vista, or Windows 7 Processor: 2.0+ GHz or better (dual core recommended) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 8000 series or higher (Shader Model 3 Compatible) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
